serverSide.sharedRegions

Class Bar

  • java.lang.Object
    • serverSide.sharedRegions.Bar

  • public class Bar
extends java.lang.Object
    Bar. It is responsible for the the synchronization of the waiter, student and chef during the order processing and is implemented as an implicit monitor. There is two internal synchronization points: two blocking points for the waiter, where he waits for something to happen and waits for the student to signal that he can bring the next course.
